author: Marvel Entertainment
description:
This week, writer Phillip Kennedy Johnson and artist Nic Klein discuss their latest comic book series: Infernal Hulk. Plus, Funko’s Director of Creative Development Gary Ham and Senior Product Developer Hung Chu dive into the company’s history with Marvel. Later on, we’ll provide a Marvel gift guide for the holiday season. All time codes are approximate.  

00:00 - Welcome Back!
1:10 - Writer Phillip Kennedy Johnson and artist Nic Klein on new series Infernal Hulk
11:14 - Funko x Marvel History with Director of Creative Development Gary Ham and Senior Product Developer Hung Chu
20:59 - Marvel gift guide!

title: Infernal Hulk’s Marvel Comics Debut! | The Official Marvel Podcast
